title: Installation issue:  Casacore
body:
Dear @mpokorny, 

May you please update the casacore?

I think it has two minor bugs that should be updated. 

1.    depends_on('cfitsio@3.181:')  : Actually, 3.181 is an old version. The newest one is 3.49.  The error solved when I set 3.181 to 3.40

2.   depends_on('hdf5', when='+hdf5') should be replaced with "depends_on('hdf5+hl', when='+hdf5')"

Otherwise, the cmake should report the error listed as follows. 

```

            rbhgkylu/bin/python3.8

            rbhgkylu/lib/libpython3.8.so
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install casacore@3.3.0%gcc@9.3.0 fftw=True hdf5=True openmp=True python=True target=x86_64
...
```

### Information on your system


<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-cascadelake
* **Concretizer:** original
